author: gstein
msg: As part of the prior checkin, enable construction of the URL to the
activity-collection-set.
* dav_svn.h (DAV_SVN_BUILD_URI_ACT_COLLECTION): new enum value to specify
building the activity collection set URL
* util.c (dav_svn_build_uri): construct and return the new URL

author: gstein
msg: Sync with the latest Apache/mod_dav changes (by John Vasta), and add a
response to the DAV:activity-collection-set OPTIONS request.
(dav_svn_set_target): removed. it is now "update" and is optional, and we
won't ever support it, so it goes away.
(dav_svn_add_label, dav_svn_remove_label): we won't provide support for the
LABEL method (although we will support DAV labels as server-applied
items), so these functions go away.
(dav_svn_hooks_vsn): revise the list of hook functions, per above.
(dav_svn_get_option): add response code for the DAV:activity-collection-set
OPTIONS request.

author: gstein
msg: libsvn_ra_local is built conditionally. It is part of FS_BASED_DIRS when the
configure process decides to build it. This also puts ra_local at the right
spot in the sequence of building.

author: gstein
msg: The ENABLE macros for --enable-debug and --enable-maintainer-mode were
wonked after the recent change from --with to --enable. Specifically, the
debug/maintainer modes were always being set(!).

author: gstein
msg: Draft document of goals for an automated test suite.
Submitted by: Mo DeJong <mdejong@cygnus.com>
